alert.note: Alert for Gadsden (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 6:19PM EDT until June 24 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Gadsden County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 645 PM EDT. * At 619 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Quincy, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Quincy, Gretna, Santa Clara, Littman, Douglas City, Mount Pleasant, Quincy Airport and Sawdust. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
